short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Drive Mad 3 right in your Chrome® browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drive Mad 3 is the 3rd addition to Drive Mad by Martin Magni where you drive a car through tracks. You have to reach the finish line without flipping, stucking or crashing. The game is simple and easy to control. Just use the arrow keys/mouse click to drive and balance the car movement.

In this game you will face new challenges on each track. Some tracks have hills and obstacles you have to drive over.

If you want to play it over to your phone or tablet, just download the app from Play Store or App Store.

With this extension you can play Drive Mad 3 every time you open your browser.

Try Drive Mad 3 by Martin Magni with this Chrome extension.

The Drive Mad 3 © rights reserved by the Martin Magni
